# Bestow Insight (Spell)
## Overview
[[Enchantment Spells|Enchantment]] ([[Compulsion Spells|compulsion]])

**Level:** [[2nd Level Bard Spells|Bard 2]], [[3rd Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 3]], [[2nd Level Inquisitor Spells|Inquisitor 2]], [[2nd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 2]], [[2nd Level Witch Spells|Witch 2]], [[2nd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 5th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 5]], [[BoXM 3rd-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 3]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Component:** V, S

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** One creature touched

**Duration:** 1 minute/level

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Advanced Race Guide, pg. 79

When casting this spell, choose a single skill that you have at least one rank in. The target gains a +2 insight bonus on skill checks with this skill and is considered trained in that skill. The insight bonus increases by 1 for every four levels of the caster (maximum +6). Furthermore, once before the spell’s duration, the target can choose to roll two checks and take the greater result. Doing so ends the spell’s other effects.
